Articles.Content: Kerbonaut Kyre here, saying hello and lets fly! I\'ve been messing with this game for a little bit now, and its just.... so.... addicting.....

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
Welcome to the forums and have fun!

The addiction is completely impossible to get rid of! Mind you it feels to satisfying to be at work, hate your boss, and pretend he\'s in that little teeny, tiny pod heading for the Mun at 1800 m/s...
